name: Harley's Breakout
description:
Welcome to Harley's Breakout. Harley Quinn has had enough of the Bat-Family. So her and the Joker (Her Puddin) are fighting back.

Controls

Move Harley (The Paddle) left and right to bounce the Joker ball to hit the symbols of the Bat-Family to get a high score.

*Run EXE file*
